backend/main.mo: Defines an actor managing syllabus items with creation, task updates, status changes, and retrieval using a Map-backed store.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs used as evidence for implemented functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app with a root div and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell providing header, tab navigation, and routing between Dashboard and Divide & Conquer pages.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalQuot: Renders a styled motivational quote card with decorative sparkles.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Displays a status badge using theme mappings to apply proper label and styling.
frontend/src/components/SyllabusItemSele: Dropdown selector listing syllabus items with topic, chapter, and status badge for choosing one to manage.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Renders tasks for a syllabus item with status update controls and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/WarMapNode.tsx: Card node representing a syllabus item showing description, status, task count, and completion state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider to manage authentication state, identity loading, and login/logout operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating syllabus items and tasks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/statusTheme.ts: Maps syllabus task statuses to themed UI classes and exposes a helper to retrieve the theme for a given status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardWarMap.tsx: Renders the syllabus war map view with loading/error states and displays items using WarMapNode components and a background theme.
frontend/src/pages/DivideAndConquer.tsx: Provides a UI for creating chapters, adding tasks, and updating task status using query hooks and interactive form components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, defining content paths, and extending theme with custom fonts, colors, radii, shadows, and keyframes for the app’s battle‑map aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the study planner’s war‑map theme, required images, and implemented features with color‑coded status zones.
